entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.0.0
entry.content:
Hightlights

  • EmulatorJS player: Play retro games in your web browser
  • Saves and states: Upload/downlaod game saves, and play them with EmulatorJS
  • More metadata: Extracts more information from IGDB, like release date, genres, related games, etc.
  • New license: Now licensed under AGPL-3.0 to promote community contributions

New features

  • Manually trigger async tasks from the UI
  • New /stats endpoint to get library statistics
  • Multi-file roms now download with .m3u file
  • Small banner in UI when new version is available
  • Manual search now also checks alternative names

Other changes

  • Redis is now built into the image
  • Dropped support for build-in SQLite database
  • Faster search against IGDB API with better results
  • New covers when game or cover art not found
  • Improved build process and release tagging
  • Improved error handling and logging

Fixes

  • Validation is run on config.yml file to ensure compatibility
  • Fix downloading single file from multi-file roms
  • Fix compressing large files for download
  • Reworked the authetication system to reduce CSRF and login issues
  • Reconnect websockets on page reload to catch scan progress
  • Many other small bug fixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.0.1
entry.content:
[!WARNING]
This hotfix requires a few changes:

  • A new volume has to be bound to /redis-data, check the docker-compose.example.yml file
  • If you're seeing "Decompress Game Core" when trying to run games in EmulatorJS, you'll need to clear storage in your browser to clear IndexedDB

Fixed

  • Fix for integrated redis data persist. Check the docker-compose.example.yml
  • Fixed emulatorjs integration. Fixes #695
  • Fixed 404 for assets endpoint
  • Fixed sqlite to mariadb migration
  • Fixed async tasks not running and throwing errors
  • Fixed sqlite to mariadb migration. Fixes #697 and #688
  • Fixed multipart game selector when change between games

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.0.2
entry.content:
[!CAUTION]
This build has a critical bug that may cause RomM to fail to start, we recommend staying on 3.0.1 until a fix is released.

[!WARNING]
RomM has been organized in github and dockerhub! New images will be upload to rommapp/romm repository on dockerhub and ghcr.

Added

  • Famicon disk system to emulatorjs
  • Allow setting PUID/GUID/UMASK with environment variables
  • Re-added external redis support. You can now use an external redis instance with RomM by setting REDIS_HOST and REDIS_PORT in the env variables. If you have those variables currently set but want to use the internal one, you'll have to remove those them.

Changed

  • Added scrolling to scan logs
  • Disabled amiga emulator until bios support added
  • Updated docker-compose.example.yml file to match new dockerhub rommapp organization

Fixed

  • Normalized IGDB search for better results
  • Fixed player viewport to fit screen better
  • Fixed safari downloads file names

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.0.3
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Removed PUID/GUID environment variables
  • We're still working on getting RomM running with a non-root user, so as of this release it still needs to be run as root
  • Fix running when REDIS_HOST env variable isn't set

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.1.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
The volume bound to /romm/logs needs to be removed, as it is no longer used * Binding a volume/folder for /romm/config is now required*

What's Changed

  • Run the backend under Gunicorn by @psych0d0g in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/756
  • Mobygames API support by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/661
  • Add additional platform icons (astrocade, pc-fx, etc.) by @Casuallynoted in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/764
  • Store fixtures in redis with indexes by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/763
  • Fix content disposition header by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/767
  • Fix nightly scans resetting igdb/moby IDs by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/785
  • Renamed some non-IGDB platform icons to work with Mobygames slugs by @Casuallynoted in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/787
  • Fixed viewer role UI permissions by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/794
  • Track last login and active times for users by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/797
  • Improved multi-select games by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/799
  • Improved custom art management by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/796
  • Fixed readme links by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/800
  • Added more configuration for external redis by @HellLord77 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/811
  • Add platform + general upload roms dialog added by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/804
  • Added a button to copy download link by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/810

New Contributors

  • @HellLord77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/811

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.0.3...3.1.0
